column4: he was just commenting on the lack of nautilus option in "connect to server"
which I agree with.. why not, its got samba there.
I know.  I think there should be one as well.  I was just making sure you guys knew how to use it :)
I used to know.. I forgot it been so long
i know its /etc/exports but the actual parameters are gobbledegook to me now
Bookman there is JFTP in the repos.  I just did a search and found it.  "Graphical network and file transfer client"
What does "ssh-copy-id" do?
its a metacity effect.. compiz could affect it tho.
what gfx you using?
Can I turn it off in gconf-editor?
What is a gfx?
graphic chip
Ati Radeon 9550
I'm using the radeon module (radeonfb)
quite an old card, might be the radeon open source driver.
I have a faster ati (9800) but am relegated to using the open source radeon driver, which is fine for compiz but useless for any decent game.
I'm going to try to turn of that little fade effect and see what happens.  I'll let you know.
that fade effect is also there when changing wallpapers
try that.
I have a small confession to make.  Don't tell anyone but I'm actually using debian :P.  I don't have that wallpaper transition effect.
well, 1 wallpaper fades into another.. so not quite the same, its a compiz effect I think
I have seen it.
